page.title: 20TRANSPORT
page.content: {BUSES}The bus service in this area is good,with 6 buses passing through,all following different routes.The Guernsey bus is white,but several have colourful advertisements showing local attractions.{CARS}Most people own cars and the roads leading to town are fairly busy.The traffic becomes congested during the rush-hour.{ {BICYCLES}There is one cycle-hire shop near to the St Martins Church Hall. Many tourists like to hire bikes in order to explore the very narrow Guernsey lanes,which cause great difficulties to other modes of transport.Residents also use bicycles, but it is a very hilly area and a long cycling distance from town.
